workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.1483349987695281 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.19429391485292713 --weight-decay 0.00021844523313308085 --lr 1.8083764440571193e-05 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 167988 --max-lr 5.8185495611218494e-05 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.6037073118341543 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.14909033748304598 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
